name: The zombies away from me - Ludum Dare #46
name_original: The zombies away from me - Ludum Dare #46
description:
The zombies away from me is a survival game where you have to protect Billy the stickman.

Billy

Try to make the highest score possible.
To kill a zombie / alien, I don't really know what I drew, just click on it.

Zombie/Alien

From a score of 30, red zombies / aliens will appear, they are much bigger than the others, it takes 2 clicks to kill them.

Zombie/Alien - Red

If you click on the sun, you will switch to night mode, you will only see the enemy's red eyes.

If you have reached the score of 70, you will see little green men appear.

You will also have to face the little green men, they are smaller, they are more difficult to kill.

Little Green Men

Please don't judge the graphics and the music.

It's a French game.
